column1: 81332143$Yu-Jo Friendship$Unlimited$SPELL$$$$$$$$$$$$Offer your opponent a handshake. If they accept your handshake
column2: each player's Life Points become half the combined Life Points of both players. If you have "Unity" in your hand and show it to your opponent
column3: they must accept the handshake.$Unity$$Reveals your hand for effect$Effect$
